meanings.definition: The main course of a meal.
meanings.sent1: For dinner, the delicious entree was a juicy steak with mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers a variety of entrees, including pasta dishes and seafood platters.
meanings.sent3: At the family gathering, the entree disappeared so quickly that no one got seconds!
meanings.sent4: The entree was a symphony of flavors that danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The chef's specialty entree was so memorable that I still dream about it.

meanings.sent1: The entree into the building required scanning a security badge.
meanings.sent2: After the entree through the gate, we found ourselves in a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The entree into the party was met with cheers and applause.
meanings.sent4: His entree into the world of music was met with critical acclaim.
meanings.sent5: The entree into the mysterious cave filled me with excitement and trepidation.
